sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.`uuid`,a.apply_dept,a.ship_cloud,d.dept_cname apply_dept_name,au.user_name apply_user_name,a.`theme`,a.`it_price`,a.`mt_price`,a.`close_it_price`,a.`close_mt_price`, a.`address`,a.`pass_time`,a.`close_pass_time`,a.`ship_no`,a.`ship_date`,a.`ship_type`,a.ship_phone,a.`ship_status`,a.`remark`, a.`status`,a.`sd_status`,a.`sd_time`,a.`smd_status`,a.`smd_time`,a.`fd_status`,a.`fd_time`,a.`close_sd_status`,a.`close_sd_time`,a.`spe_remark`, a.`close_fd_status`,a.`close_fd_time`,a.`close_smd_status`,a.`close_smd_time`,su.USER_NAME sd_user_name,smu.USER_NAME smd_user_name, csu.USER_NAME close_sd_user_name,csmu.USER_NAME close_smd_user_name,fdu.`USER_NAME` fd_user_name,fdcu.`USER_NAME` close_fd_name, ndcu.`USER_NAME` close_nd_name FROM qkjm_r_active a LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (a.apply_dept = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON (a.apply_user = au.uuid) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user su ON (a.sd_user = su.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user smu ON (a.smd_user = smu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csu ON (a.close_sd_user = csu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csmu ON (a.close_smd_user = csmu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdu ON (a.`fd_user`=fdu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdcu ON (a.`close_fd_user`=fdcu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user ndcu ON (a.`close_nd_user`=ndcu.`UUID`) WHERE a.`status`>=0 and a.activeType=0
a.uuid=#uuid# a.fstauts=#fstauts# a.cost_types=#cost_types# a.uid=#uid#
a.apply_dept=#apply_dept# a.apply_dept LIKE CONCAT(#apply_dept#,'%')
a.apply_user=#apply_user# a.plan_start=#plan_start# a.address=#address# a.sd_status=#sd_status#
a.sd_status>=#sd_statused# a.smd_status=#smd_status# a.fd_status=#fd_status# a.close_fd_status=#close_fd_status# a.close_nd_status=#close_nd_status#
a.apply_dept In #apply_depts[]#
a.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# a.apply_user=#apply_userDouble#
a.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# a.apply_user=#apply_userDouble#
a.close_sd_status=#close_sd_status#
a.close_sd_status>=#close_sded_status# a.close_smd_status=#close_smd_status# a.status=#status# a.ship_status=#ship_status# a.theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#theme#,'%') a.plan_start>=#plan_start_begin# a.plan_end<=DATE_ADD(#plan_start_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.pass_time>=#pass_time_start# a.pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.close_pass_time>=#close_pass_time_start# a.close_pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#close_pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) NOT ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`) AND a.`spe_remark`!="" (ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`) or a.`spe_remark`="")
EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost mem,s_vip_member m WHERE mem.`member_id` = m.`UUID` AND a.`uuid` = mem.`active_id` AND m.`MEMBER_NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#member_id#,'%') )
(a.sd_status>=70 or (a.sd_status>=60 and a.fstauts=1)) (a.close_sd_status>=70 or (a.close_sd_status>=60 and a.fstauts=1)) ORDER BY a.add_time DESC LIMIT 1000

SELECT a.`uuid`,a.ship_cloud,d.dept_cname apply_dept_name,au.user_name apply_user_name, a.`pass_time`,a.`close_pass_time`,a.`ship_no`,a.`ship_date`,a.`ship_type`,a.ship_phone,a.`ship_status`,a.`remark`, a.`status`,a.`sd_status`,a.`sd_time`,a.`smd_status`,a.`smd_time`,a.`fd_status`,a.`fd_time`,a.`close_sd_status`,a.`close_sd_time`,a.`spe_remark`, a.`close_fd_status`,a.`close_fd_time`,a.`close_smd_status`,a.`close_smd_time`,su.USER_NAME sd_user_name,smu.USER_NAME smd_user_name, csu.USER_NAME close_sd_user_name,csmu.USER_NAME close_smd_user_name,fdu.`USER_NAME` fd_user_name,fdcu.`USER_NAME` close_fd_name, ndcu.`USER_NAME` close_nd_name,a.design_type,a.design_name,a.design_num,a.design_price,a.close_design_num,a.close_design_price,close_design_total,design_total FROM qkjm_r_active a LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (a.apply_dept = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON (a.apply_user = au.uuid) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user su ON (a.sd_user = su.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user smu ON (a.smd_user = smu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csu ON (a.close_sd_user = csu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csmu ON (a.close_smd_user = csmu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdu ON (a.`fd_user`=fdu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdcu ON (a.`close_fd_user`=fdcu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user ndcu ON (a.`close_nd_user`=ndcu.`UUID`) WHERE a.`status`>=0 and a.activeType=1
a.uuid=#uuid# a.fstauts=#fstauts# a.uid=#uid#
a.apply_dept=#apply_dept# a.apply_dept LIKE CONCAT(#apply_dept#,'%')
a.apply_user=#apply_user# a.design_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#design_name#,'%') a.design_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#design_type#,'%') a.plan_start=#plan_start# a.address=#address# a.sd_status=#sd_status#
a.sd_status>=#sd_statused# a.smd_status=#smd_status# a.fd_status=#fd_status# a.close_fd_status=#close_fd_status# a.close_nd_status=#close_nd_status#
a.apply_dept In #apply_depts[]#
a.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# a.apply_user=#apply_userDouble#
a.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# a.apply_user=#apply_userDouble#
a.close_sd_status=#close_sd_status#
a.close_sd_status>=#close_sded_status# a.close_smd_status=#close_smd_status# a.status=#status# a.ship_status=#ship_status# a.theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#theme#,'%') a.plan_start>=#plan_start_begin# a.plan_end<=DATE_ADD(#plan_start_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.pass_time>=#pass_time_start# a.pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.close_pass_time>=#close_pass_time_start# a.close_pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#close_pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) NOT ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`) AND a.`spe_remark`!="" (ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`) or a.`spe_remark`="")
EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost mem,s_vip_member m WHERE mem.`member_id` = m.`UUID` AND a.`uuid` = mem.`active_id` AND m.`MEMBER_NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#member_id#,'%') )
(a.sd_status>=70 or (a.sd_status>=60 and a.fstauts=1)) (a.close_sd_status>=70 or (a.close_sd_status>=60 and a.fstauts=1)) ORDER BY a.add_time DESC LIMIT 1000

select COUNT(*) from (
SELECT 1 FROM qkjm_r_active a LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (a.apply_dept = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON (a.apply_user = au.uuid) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user su ON (a.sd_user = su.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user smu ON (a.smd_user = smu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csu ON (a.close_sd_user = csu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csmu ON (a.close_smd_user = csmu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdu ON (a.`fd_user`=fdu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdcu ON (a.`close_fd_user`=fdcu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user ndcu ON (a.`close_nd_user`=ndcu.`UUID`) WHERE a.`status`>=0
a.uuid=#uuid# a.fstauts=#fstauts# a.cost_types=#cost_types# a.uid=#uid#
a.apply_dept=#apply_dept# a.apply_dept LIKE CONCAT(#apply_dept#,'%')
a.apply_user=#apply_user# a.plan_start=#plan_start# a.address=#address# a.sd_status=#sd_status# a.smd_status=#smd_status# a.fd_status=#fd_status# a.close_fd_status=#close_fd_status# a.close_nd_status=#close_nd_status#
a.apply_dept In #apply_depts[]#
a.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# a.apply_user=#apply_userDouble#
a.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# a.apply_user=#apply_userDouble#
a.close_sd_status=#close_sd_status# a.close_smd_status=#close_smd_status# a.status=#status# a.ship_status=#ship_status# a.theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#theme#,'%') a.plan_start>=#plan_start_begin# a.plan_end<=DATE_ADD(#plan_start_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.pass_time>=#pass_time_start# a.pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.close_pass_time>=#close_pass_time_start# a.close_pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#close_pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) NOT ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`) AND a.`spe_remark`!="" ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`)
EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost mem,s_vip_member m WHERE mem.`member_id` = m.`UUID` AND a.`uuid` = mem.`active_id` AND m.`MEMBER_NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#member_id#,'%') )
(a.sd_status>=70 or (a.sd_status>=60 and a.fstauts=1)) (a.close_sd_status>=70 or (a.close_sd_status>=60 and a.fstauts=1)) LIMIT 1000 ) b

SELECT a.`uuid`,d.dept_cname apply_dept_name,au.user_name apply_user_name,a.`theme`,a.`it_price`,a.`mt_price`,a.`close_it_price`,a.`close_mt_price`, a.`address`,a.`pass_time`,a.`close_pass_time`,a.`ship_no`,a.`ship_date`,a.`ship_type`,a.`ship_phone`,a.`ship_status`,a.`remark`, a.`status`,a.`sd_status`,a.`sd_time`,a.`smd_status`,a.`smd_time`,a.`fd_status`,a.`fd_time`,a.`close_sd_status`,a.`close_sd_time`,a.`spe_remark`, a.`close_fd_status`,a.`close_fd_time`,a.`close_smd_status`,a.`close_smd_time`,su.USER_NAME sd_user_name,smu.USER_NAME smd_user_name, csu.USER_NAME close_sd_user_name,csmu.USER_NAME close_smd_user_name,fdu.`USER_NAME` fd_user_name,fdcu.`USER_NAME` close_fd_name, ndcu.`USER_NAME` close_nd_name FROM qkjm_r_active a LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (a.apply_dept = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON (a.apply_user = au.uuid) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user su ON (a.sd_user = su.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user smu ON (a.smd_user = smu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csu ON (a.close_sd_user = csu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csmu ON (a.close_smd_user = csmu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdu ON (a.`fd_user`=fdu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdcu ON (a.`close_fd_user`=fdcu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user ndcu ON (a.`close_nd_user`=ndcu.`UUID`) WHERE a.`status`>=0
a.uuid=#uuid# a.uid=#uid#
a.apply_dept=#apply_dept# a.apply_dept LIKE CONCAT(#apply_dept#,'%')
a.apply_user=#apply_user# a.plan_start=#plan_start# a.address=#address# a.sd_status=#sd_status# a.smd_status=#smd_status# a.fd_status=#fd_status# a.close_fd_status=#close_fd_status# a.close_nd_status=#close_nd_status#
a.apply_dept In #apply_depts[]#
a.close_sd_status=#close_sd_status# a.close_smd_status=#close_smd_status# a.status=#status# a.ship_status=#ship_status# a.theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#theme#,'%') a.plan_start>=#plan_start_begin# a.plan_end<=DATE_ADD(#plan_start_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.pass_time>=#pass_time_start# a.pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) a.close_pass_time>=#close_pass_time_start# a.close_pass_time<=DATE_ADD(#close_pass_time_end#,INTERVAL 1 day) NOT ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`) AND a.`spe_remark`!="" ISNULL(a.`spe_remark`)
EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost mem,s_vip_member m WHERE mem.`member_id` = m.`UUID` AND a.`uuid` = mem.`active_id` AND m.`MEMBER_NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#member_id#,'%') )
a.`uuid`>#pageup# ORDER BY a.add_time LIMIT 1 a.uuid<#pagedown# ORDER BY a.add_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.`uuid` duid,a.*,d.dept_cname apply_dept_name,au.user_name apply_user_name, su.USER_NAME sd_user_name,smu.USER_NAME smd_user_name, csu.USER_NAME close_sd_user_name,csmu.USER_NAME close_smd_user_name, su.user_sign sd_user_sign,smu.user_sign smd_user_sign, csu.user_sign close_sd_user_sign,csmu.user_sign close_smd_user_sign,fdu.`USER_NAME` fd_user_name,fdcu.`USER_NAME` close_fd_name, ndcu.`USER_NAME` close_nd_name FROM qkjm_r_active a LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (a.apply_dept = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON (a.apply_user = au.uuid) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user su ON (a.sd_user = su.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user smu ON (a.smd_user = smu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csu ON (a.close_sd_user = csu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user csmu ON (a.close_smd_user = csmu.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdu ON (a.`fd_user`=fdu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fdcu ON (a.`close_fd_user`=fdcu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user ndcu ON (a.`close_nd_user`=ndcu.`UUID`) WHERE a.`status`>=0 AND a.uuid=#value#

SELECT s.`biz_user` biz_user, u.`USER_NAME` puser_name,u.`user_sign` puser_sign,s.`biz_time` biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`)
s.`biz_status01`>=4 AND s.`biz_status01`<6 AND s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(s.`biz_time`) FROM qkjm_h_process s WHERE s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_status01`=3 AND s.`process_id`=1) s.`biz_status01`>=1 AND s.`biz_status01`<=2 AND s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(s.`biz_time`) FROM qkjm_h_process s WHERE s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_status01`=0 AND s.`process_id`=1)
(s.`biz_status02`=40 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_SDSTATUS') ((s.`biz_status02`=60 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_SDSTATUS') or (s.`biz_status03`=60 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_SMDSTATUS')) s.`biz_status02`=40 and s.`biz_status03`=40 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_SMDSTATUS' s.`biz_status03`=50 AND s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_MDY_SMDSTATUS'
((s.`biz_status03`=70 AND s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_MDY_SMDSTATUS') or (s.`biz_status02`=70 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_SDSTATUS') )
a.`fd_status`>=10 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_FDSTATUS'
(s.`biz_status04`=30 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SDSTATUS') (s.`biz_status04`=40 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SDSTATUS') ((s.`biz_status04`=60 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SDSTATUS') or (s.`biz_status05`=60 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SMDSTATUS')) s.`biz_status04`=40 and s.`biz_status05`=40 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SMDSTATUS' s.`biz_status05`=50 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SMDSTATUS' ((s.`biz_status05`=70 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SMDSTATUS') or (s.`biz_status04`=70 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SDSTATUS'))
s.`biz_id`=#biz_id#
a.`close_fd_status`>=10 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_FDCSTATUS' a.`close_nd_status`=10 and s.biz_sign='ACTIVE_MDY_NDCSTATUS'
GROUP BY s.`biz_user` ORDER BY s.`biz_time` DESC

SELECT p.*,u.`USER_NAME` uname FROM qkjm_h_process p LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (p.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`)
p.`process_id`=1 and biz_id=#biz_id#

SELECT MAX(a.baotime) baotime,MAX(a.stars) stars,MAX(a.sing) sing,MAX(a.spass) spass,MAX(a.starj) starj,MAX(a.jing) jing,MAX(a.jpass) jpass FROM ( SELECT MAX(s.`biz_time`) baotime,NULL stars,NULL sing,NULL spass,NULL starj,NULL jing,NULL jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=1 AND s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_MDY_STATUS' AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# UNION ALL SELECT NULL baotime,MAX(s.`biz_time`) stars,NULL sing,NULL spass,NULL starj,NULL jing,NULL jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=0 AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# UNION ALL SELECT NULL baotime,NULL stars,MAX(s.`biz_time`) sing,NULL spass,NULL starj,NULL jing,NULL jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=1 AND (s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_MDY_SMDSTATUS' OR s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_MDY_SDSTATUS') AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# UNION ALL SELECT NULL baotime,NULL stars,NULL sing,MAX(s.`biz_time`) spass,NULL starj,NULL jing,NULL jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=2 AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# UNION ALL SELECT NULL baotime,NULL stars,NULL sing,NULL spass,MAX(s.`biz_time`) starj,NULL jing,NULL jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=3 AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# UNION ALL SELECT NULL baotime,NULL stars,NULL sing,NULL spass,NULL starj,MAX(s.`biz_time`) jing,NULL jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=4 AND (s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SDSTATUS' OR s.`biz_sign`='ACTIVE_CLOSE_SMDSTATUS') AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# UNION ALL SELECT NULL baotime,NULL stars,NULL sing,NULL spass,NULL starj,NULL jing,MAX(s.`biz_time`) jpass FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_active a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=1 AND s.`biz_status01`=5 AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# )a
sqlMap.update: Update qkjm_r_active Set theme=#theme#, purpose=#purpose#, plan_start=#plan_start#, plan_end=#plan_end#, address=#address#, person=#person#, apply_dept=#apply_dept#, note=#note#, expect=#expect#, lm_user=#lm_user#, remark=#remark#, m_upprice=#m_upprice#, m_price=#m_price#, m_bprice=#m_bprice#, f_upprice=#f_upprice#, f_price=#f_price#, f_bprice=#f_bprice#, cost_types=#cost_types# Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_active Set active_type=#active_type#, design_type=#design_type#, design_name=#design_name#, design_num=#design_num#, design_total=#design_total#, design_price=#design_price#, assumed=#assumed#, plan_end=#plan_end#, plan_start=#plan_start#, store_material=#store_material#, note=#note#, store_size=#store_size# Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_active Set close_design_num=#close_design_num#, close_design_price=#close_design_price#, close_assumed=#close_assumed#, close_store_material=#close_store_material#, close_store_size=#close_store_size#, close_design_total=#close_design_total#, close_note=#close_note# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set status=#status#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set sd_status=#sd_status#, sd_user=#sd_user#, sd_time=#sd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_active Set smd_status=#smd_status#, smd_user=#smd_user#, smd_time=#smd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user#
Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set fd_status=#fd_status#, fd_user=#fd_user#, fd_time=#fd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set close_fd_status=#close_fd_status#, close_fd_user=#close_fd_user#, close_fd_time=#close_fd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set close_nd_status=#close_nd_status#, close_nd_user=#close_nd_user#, close_nd_time=#close_nd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#

UPDATE qkjm_r_active t SET t.it_price = ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.total_price),0) FROM ( SELECT m.total_price FROM qkjm_r_active_posm m WHERE m.active_id = #value# AND `status` = 1 UNION ALL SELECT p.total_price FROM qkjm_r_active_product p WHERE p.active_id = #value# AND `status` = 1)a ) WHERE t.uuid = #value#
UPDATE qkjm_r_active a SET a.mt_price = ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(total_price),0) FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost WHERE active_id = #value# AND `status` = 1 ) WHERE a.uuid = #value#
Update qkjm_r_active Set status=#status#, pass_time=now(), remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set status=5, close_pass_time=now(), remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set status=3, close_start=now(), remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_active Set close_note=#close_note#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user#, close_m_upprice=#close_m_upprice#, close_m_price=#close_m_price#, close_m_bprice=#close_m_bprice#, close_f_upprice=#close_f_upprice#, close_f_price=#close_f_price#, close_f_bprice=#close_f_bprice#, cost_types=#cost_types# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set spe_remark=#spe_remark# Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_active Set close_sd_status=#close_sd_status#, close_sd_user=#close_sd_user#, close_sd_time=#close_sd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user#
Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_active Set close_smd_status=#close_smd_status#, close_smd_user=#close_smd_user#, close_smd_time=#close_smd_time#, remark=#remark#, lm_user=#lm_user#
Where uuid = #uuid#

UPDATE qkjm_r_active t SET t.close_it_price = ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.total_price),0) FROM ( SELECT m.total_price FROM qkjm_r_active_posm m WHERE m.active_id = #value# AND `status` = 2 UNION ALL SELECT p.total_price FROM qkjm_r_active_product p WHERE p.active_id = #value# AND `status` = 2)a ) WHERE t.uuid = #value#
UPDATE qkjm_r_active a SET a.close_mt_price = ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(total_price),0) FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost WHERE active_id = #value# AND `status` = 2 ) WHERE a.uuid = #value#

Update qkjm_r_active Set ship_status=#ship_status#, ship_ware=#ship_ware#, ship_date=#ship_date#, ship_no=#ship_no#, ship_cloud=#ship_cloud#, ship_phone=#ship_phone#, remark=#remark#, ship_type=#ship_type#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set active_type=#active_type# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_active Set fstauts=#fstauts# Where uuid = #uuid#
sqlMap.select:
select * from qkjm_r_active where uuid in( SELECT m.`active_id` FROM qkjm_r_active_memcost m
m.member_id = #customer_id#
